content.p: A helpful guide to take you through the steps to create a 'Find Your Nottingham hub' account. The My UoN account will help you save courses and resources to a personal portal that you may find useful throughout the application process. Click create to complete the sign up process. Head back to the sign in button and try signing in. You can delete your Find Your Nottingham hub account by visiting the Account Management section on the Find your Nottingham hub page, once you are logged in. Deleting your account will have no impact on your application. If you can't find the answer to your question or having trouble setting up your account, please contact us by using this enquiry form. Applying Everything you need to know, from understanding your offer to accepting your place. You've firmly accepted your offer, that's great news. We'll guide you through what's next. Finding the right words to include in your personal statement can be tricky, but we're here to guide you through it. Campus and facilities Welcome to the University of Nottingham. Each of our UK campuses has a unique character and provides access to world-leading facilities. Head back to the homepage, sign in and we'll help you find relevant study options, tailored information and advice to become a student at the University of Nottingham.
